data.title: UTC to IRST Time Converter
data.meta_description: Convert UTC to IRST time zone, calculate the time difference between Universal Time (UTC/GMT) and Iran Standard Time (IRST).
data.text:
Convert UTC time to Iran Standard Time. IRST time zone offset is UTC+03:30.

Time Difference between UTC and IRST

Iran Standard Time is 3 hours 30 minutes ahead from the UTC universal time.

UTC to IRST Time Conversion Table
